summary: The story of a woman dealing with her daughter's death while trying to keep her marriage and her relationship with her stepson.
cast: Natalie Portman|Scott Cohen|Lisa Kudrow|Charlie Tahan|Lauren Ambrose|Michael Cristofer|Debra Monk|Mona Fastvold|Anthony Rapp|Kendra Kassebaum|Elizabeth Marvel|Mary Joy|Maria Dizzia|Ira Hawkins|Laura Odeh|Nicolette Hart|Dave Bradford|Daisy Tahan|Susan Bruce|Lisa LeGuillou|Pat Goodwin|Nikki Renee Daniels|Jordan Simmons|Leslie Rodriguez Kritzer|Natalia Volkodaeva|Mark Gerrard|Phil McGlaston|Owen Shaw|Susan Hogelin-Black|Doug Williford|Maureen Flynn|Gail Bruno|Peter Conboy|Marcia Miller|Loukas Papas|Elana Simon|Tom Stratford
keywords: stepmother|manhattan new york city|based on novel|united states of america|sids
title: El amor y otras cosas imposibles
